item.title: malga
item.description: TL;DR Had an old Fire Tablet laying around, repurposed it as a web weather app display. But why? Everyday, too much technology is thrown out to be collected in landfills around the world. Even if it’s just me, I wanted to take part in reducing the landfill, device by device. Development Key points Has to be responsive to multiple device screens Has to show time, date, and weather APIs used
